# Max Int8

> Maximum signed 8-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int8-max' );
```

#### INT8_MAX

Maximum 8-bit signed integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( INT8_MAX === 127 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
